programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Eiverija lūdz Džeku darboties par padomdevēju kādam, kas nav Liza. Tomēr Lizai ir savas problēmas - viņas precētais 80 gadus vecais tēvs apmeklē vientuļnieku bārus. Dženna ir dusmīga, jo NBC ir sagatavots nekrologs Treisijam, bet ne viņai.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza bieži apmeklē vietējo veikalu, jo uzskata, ka tā viņa palīdz videi, un viņu džinsi liek viņai izskatīties labi. Tikmēr Džeks palīdz ienaidnieka politiskajam sāncensim, bet Dženna palīdz Treisijam mērķēt uz Zelta globusa nomināciju.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs atklājis, ka kāds sens draugs dzīvo mežā ar Bookmobile, kuru viņi nozaga pirms vairākiem gadiem. Pie viena, viņš kļuvis pavisam traks.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Kad Erls mēģina atlīdzināt vīrietim, kuru viņš piekrāpa par 100 dolāriem, viņš atklāj, ka Džoja un viņas draugi joprojām viņu māna.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Džordžs vecākais tiek lūgts palīdzēt futbola komandai. Mendija atklāj Džordžija un Mīma slepeno sadarbību.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldona komiksu grāmatas meklējumi aizved viņu līdz atklājumam. Džordžijai un Mendijai ir nepatīkama pirmā tikšanās ar viņas vecākiem Džimu un Odriju.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīriem ir jāaizstāv sevi - pulcējas starptautisks vampīru tribunāls, lai tiesātu viņus par viņu pārkāpumiem.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nadja apmāca Dženu, kā tikt galā ar savu pirmo upuri, un Nandors piesakās Amerikas pilsonībai.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kāds no Džeka audzēkņiem anonīmi ziņo par viņu, ka viņš ir atcēlis viņu tik gaidīto cūkas sadalīšanu. Durbina izredzes uz Gada direktoru ir apdraudētas, kad viesosies superintendents.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks pārliecina Mailu, ka Devins ir viņa ārlaulības dēls; Durbins, Mērija, Stefa un Mišela nav vienisprātis par Sadie Hawkins dejas tēmu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs atklājis, ka kāds sens draugs dzīvo mežā ar Bookmobile, kuru viņi nozaga pirms vairākiem gadiem. Pie viena, viņš kļuvis pavisam traks.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Kad Erls mēģina atlīdzināt vīrietim, kuru viņš piekrāpa par 100 dolāriem, viņš atklāj, ka Džoja un viņas draugi joprojām viņu māna.

programme.title: Lēdijas Čaterlejas mīļākais
programme.desc: 20. gs. divdesmitie gadi Anglijā. Kad lēdijas Čaterlejas vīrs pēc 1. pasaules kara kļūst par invalīdu, viņa iemīlas mežsargā, riskējot ar lielu skandālu, kurā saduras šķiru pretrunas un lojalitāte.

programme.title: Nožēlojamie
programme.desc: Viktora Igo klasiskā darba adaptācija. Francija laikā pēc Napoleona kariem. Žans Valžāns izvairās no neatlaidīgā inspektora Žavēra.

programme.title: Mēnessakmens
programme.desc: Pēc emocionālas tikšanās ar Reičelu Frenklins atgriežas Verinderhausā, bet dr. Dženings piedāvā vēlreiz izspēlēt tā vakara notikumus, kad pazuda Mēnessakmens.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārplas draugs tēvs Gormans tiek atrasts noslepkavots. Kad viņa saņem sarakstu ar vārdiem, ko Gormans nosūtījis brīdi pirms nāves, viņa apņemas atrast drauga slepkavu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Stāsts par 12 gadus senu vēsturi, kad Djūks un Elīza pirmo reizi satikās.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzas dzīvē viss ir kārtībā līdz brīdim, kad ierodas kāds paziņa, lai paustu šaubas par viņas lomu Nash and Sons. Djūks saņem piedāvājumu, kas izraisa attiecību krīzi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīze un Nešs joprojām nevar sastrādāties, kad saistībā ar kādu lietu ir jānonāk nozarē, kur cilvēki ir gatavi uz slepkavību, tikai lai saglabātu savus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kad Skotlendjardā darbu sāk jauns detektīvinspektors, Elīzai Skārletai ir jācīnās, lai vēlreiz sevi pierādītu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Halovīna laikā Mērdoks vajā par klaunu pārģērbušos slepkavu, kurš terorizē jaunus pārus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad apstājas Mērdoka izmeklēšana saistībā ar kādas sievietes nāvi, viņš sūta Ogdenu, kas maskējusies par cietumnieci.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izmeklējot noduršanas gadījumu, Mērdoks un Brekenrīds nejauši atklāj spiega Terensa Meijersa slepeno civilo dzīvi.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Mēnessakmens
programme.desc: Pēc emocionālas tikšanās ar Reičelu Frenklins atgriežas Verinderhausā, bet dr. Dženings piedāvā vēlreiz izspēlēt tā vakara notikumus, kad pazuda Mēnessakmens.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Francija, 1914. g. Stāsts par četrām sievietēm - Parīzes prostitūtu Margeritu, ģimenes galvu Karolīnu, klostera galveno māsu Agnesi un feministiski noskaņoto māsu Suzannu.

programme.title: Nožēlojamie
programme.desc: Noziedzniekam Žanam Valžānam un šuvējai Fantīnei ir jālemj, ko darīt kara plosītajā Francijā. Valžāna pagātne turpina viņu vajāt, bet Fantīne satiek savas dzīves lielo mīlestību.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla pavada lēdiju Virdžīniju Revelu uz viņas mājām. Grāfs Ludvigs tiek atrasts miris Entonija Keida rokās. Kāpēc Keids ir Čimniju mājās? Vai Virdžīnijas pielūdzējs tiek apsūdzēts slepkavībā?

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izmeklējot noduršanas gadījumu, Mērdoks un Brekenrīds nejauši atklāj spiega Terensa Meijersa slepeno civilo dzīvi.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai tiek uzdots atrisināt kāda augsta ranga privātā detektīva slepkavību, kura pagātne ir noslēpumos tīta.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Džeimss ir gandrīz iekārtojies jaunajā dzīvesvietā, ierodas Zigfrīda brālis Tristans. Zigfrīds ir priecīgs un lūdz Džeimsam ņemt līdzi Tristanu, lai pārbaudītu teoriju praksē.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad tiek nolaupīta Higinsa brāļa sieva, viņš tiek aizsūtīts ar izpirkuma naudu un pazūd. Mērdoks uzsāk vajāšanu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad apbalvošanas ceremonijā tiek nošauts kāds politiskais karikatūrists, Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka slepkava ir saistīts ar pilsētas attīstību.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Так далеко, так близко
programme.desc: Настя с сыном Иваном впервые за долгие годы приехали в город из деревни староверов. Их окружает чужой, непривычный, полный опасностей и соблазнов мир.

programme.title: Так далеко, так близко
programme.desc: Настя с сыном Иваном впервые за долгие годы приехали в город из деревни староверов. Их окружает чужой, непривычный, полный опасностей и соблазнов мир.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Castle Falls
programme.desc: Rival gangs seek out millions of dollars hidden inside a luxury condominium thats scheduled to be demolished, but first they have to deal with the janitor who found the loot first.

programme.title: Night Class
programme.desc: When Jake, a security guard in a small hotel, inadvertently helps out a beautiful burglar, he becomes a primary suspect and is quickly fired. Jake decides to track down the burglar himself and retrieve the stolen property.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: The Tracker
programme.desc: In 2008, Loke Hakansson was taking a family vacation in the south of Italy when his wife and his daughter have been kidnapped. Following an attempt of exchange gone awry both wife and daughter have been killed. Ten years later, Hakansson is contacted by a local detective who has re-opened the case and has new information. Reluctantly, Hakansson travels back to Italy to meet the detective. When he arrives he discovers that the detective has committed "suicide". To his dismay, Hakansson is trapped into a web of deceit that forces him to acts of violence to understand what happened to his family.

programme.title: Killerman
programme.desc: Moe Diamond, a money launderer struggling with memory loss sustained in a car crash, goes on the run, evading the police while carrying heaps of stolen cash he knows nothing about. Moe and his partner in crime Bobby "Skunk" Cohen had been given a job by Bobbys uncle Perico, wherein he gave them a sum of $20 million to launder. However, the two are ambushed while doing a side job by corrupt police officers. The two manage to escape the cops, but soon after end up in a car accident.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: A HOMICIDE INVESTIGATOR GOES AFTER A MEDIA-OBSESSED SERIAL KILLER WHO VIDEOTAPES HIS VICTIMS DEATHS.

programme.title: Kā tu to zini?
programme.desc: Pēc izslēgšanas no ASV softbola komandas un depresijas iestāšanās Līsa savā dzīvē nolēmusi veikt pārmaiņas. To rezultātā viņa nonāk mīlas trijstūrī, kurā kāds puisis no korporatīvās vides sācis cīnīties ar viņas esošo otro pusi.

programme.title: Bez nožēlas
programme.desc: Elitārs jūras kājinieks dodas ceļā, lai atriebtu savas sievas slepkavību, nonākot aizvien lielākās sazvērestībās.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pastaiga sniegotā purvā

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Ceļojums uz Ameriku
programme.desc: Āfrikas monarhs Eims uzzinājis, ka viņam ASV ir sen pazudis dēls. Viņam jāatgriežas Amerikā, lai satiktu šo negaidīto mantinieku un izveidotu attiecības ar savu dēlu.

programme.desc: Āfrikas monarhs Eims uzzinājis, ka viņam ASV ir sen pazudis dēls. Viņam jāatgriežas Amerikā, lai satiktu šo negaidīto mantinieku un izveidotu attiecības ar savu dēlu.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir reāli notikumi - lielākās relikviju medības pasaules vēsturē. Otrā pasaules kara beigās, lai saglābtu mākslas šedevrus, kurus nacisti konfiscēja visā Eiropā, tiek izveidota internacionāla mākslas vēsturnieku un zinātnieku komanda. Tajā pašā laikā vācu armija, kura ir tuvu savai sakāvei, saņem pavēli iznīcināt visus mākslas darbus, kuri atrodas viņu rokās. Vai puiši, kuri ir pazīstami ar Mikelandželo freskām un Da Vinči gleznām daudz labāk, nekā ar šautenēm un kara mākslu, spēs izglābt cilvēces lielākos kultūras sasniegumus?

programme.title: Cīņa ar manu ģimeni
programme.desc: Bijušais cīkstonis un viņa ģimene pelna iztiku,visā valstī uzstājoties nelielās vietās, savukārt viņu bērni sapņo pievienoties grupai World Wrestling Entertainment.

programme.title: Pa asmeni skrejošais
programme.desc: Losandželosa, 2019. gads. Riks Dekards ir "pa asmens smaili skrejošais" - policists un atlīdzību mednieks, kura uzdevums ir atrast četrus androīdus-replikantus, kuri nelegāli atgriezās uz Zemes un meklē savu radītāju.

Tajā pašā laikā vācu armija, kura ir tuvu savai sakāvei, saņem pavēli iznīcināt visus mākslas darbus, kuri atrodas viņu rokās. Vai puiši, kuri ir pazīstami ar Mikelandželo freskām un Da Vinči gleznām daudz labāk, nekā ar šautenēm un kara mākslu, spēs izglābt cilvēces lielākos kultūras sasniegumus?

programme.title: Gogēns. Ceļojums uz Taiti
programme.desc: Parīze, 1891. gads. Franču mākslinieks Pols Gogēns Parīzē jūtas nospiests un radoši iztukšojies. Viss apkārt šķiet samākslots. Ir jādodas uz Polinēziju pretī eksotiskam skaistumam! Diemžēl tā nedomā Gogēna sieva un viņa pieci bērni, kuri atsakās sekot līdzi Gogēnam uz "zudušo paradīzi".

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: Ted Allen hosts this hearty American cooking show that sees four little chefs showcasing their cooking abilities as they prepare and present delicious dishes for the chance to win a whopping $10,000 cash prize. This spin off version of popular cooking competition Chopped is like a breathe of fresh air as these young prodigies bring their youthful energy and originality to the Chopped kitchen. The delicious treats and competitive format is bound to leave you wanting more.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.desc: A game show specifically for chefs, in which a trip to the grocery store could land them $20,000! Three elimination challenges will put their skills to the max, testing culinary competence throughout the show. A panel of tough judges will rigorously watch over contestants and critic their accomplishments, to decide once and for all who is the top chef. Guy Fieri hosts the show, leading us through the chefs efforts in hope of winning the grand prize.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 5. Cooking show.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: In the final, the teams make alien invasion cakes. Next, 50 cake fans decide which of the six winning cakes will take home the $40,000 grand prize.

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.desc: A game show specifically for chefs, in which a trip to the grocery store could land them $20,000! Three elimination challenges will put their skills to the max, testing culinary competence throughout the show. A panel of tough judges will rigorously watch over contestants and critic their accomplishments, to decide once and for all who is the top chef. Guy Fieri hosts the show, leading us through the chefs efforts in hope of winning the grand prize.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Bring 4th The Sweets. Jesse Palmer challenges the three finalists to make amusement park treats. Then, the bakers serve sparkler-studded 4th of July parade float cakes for the title!

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Cake Boss

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Moms All-American Mac. Michael Symon recreates the Greek-American dishes of his childhood, including his mothers pasta, a crispy salad and a mashup of two desserts.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Strawberry Pie In The Sky. Strawberries steal the show when Michael Symon makes spatchcock chicken and strawberry salad. Plus, Liz puts together a fresh strawberry pie.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Duck It!. Eddie Jackson hosts a battle royale between investment banker Jonny Fine and celebrity chef Tiffani Faison. Jonny whips up a childhood duck dish to take down Tiffani.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Ostrich Impossible. Eddie Jackson shocks home cook Mike Ryan with a chance to go head-to-head against world-famous chef Robert Irvine. Can Mike achieve the impossible?

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: The chefs are challenged to create layered dishes in hopes of earning control of the game. One contender takes a sweet risk to stand out.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Mirušie nesāpina
programme.desc: Divi pionieri Amerikas pilsoņu kara laikā frontē cīnās par savu dzīvību un mīlestību.

programme.title: Uz visu banku
programme.desc: Prinstonas absolvents Ričijs uzskata, ka ir piekrāpts, tāpēc dodas uz Kostariku, lai izteiktu savas pretenzijas interneta azartspēļu magnātu Aivenu Bloku. Ričiju iekārdina Bloka solītā pasakainā bagātība, taču drīz vien viņš uzzina biedējošu patiesību par savu labdari. Kad FIB cenšas piespiest Ričiju palīdzēt tikt galā ar Bloku, puisi gaida mūža lielākais risks: viņam jāmēģina pārspēt abi draudīgie spēki.

programme.title: Hronikas veidotāji
programme.desc: Trīs vidusskolēni atklāj kaut ko ļoti neparastu, kas apvelta viņus ar pārdabiskām un neizprotamām spējām. Kad trijotne mācās kontrolēt savas spējas un izmantot tās savā labā, viņu dzīve sāk kļūt nekontrolējama, un virsroku gūst puišu rakstura tumšā puse.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Dīvainie
programme.desc: Valdot pilnīgam alkohola un narkotiku aizliegumam, atlikusī iespēja izpriecāties ir viena vienīga diena gadā.

programme.title: Džumandži: Nākamais līmenis
programme.desc: Pagājis gads, kopš Spensers un viņa draugi Marta, Fridžs un Betānija atrada veco videospēli Džumandži, un nu viņi katrs devušies savu ceļu. Tomēr noslēpumainās galda spēles spēkam nav robežu, un nemanot četrinieks no jauna nonāk bīstamajā, mistikas apvītajā valstībā. Tiesa, šoreiz spēle ir mainījusies. Džumandži apdraud varens pretinieks, un tas šo pasauli alkst iznīcināt. Spēlē iesprostotos sagaida lieli izaicinājumi, un, lai uzveiktu ļaundari, viņiem būs jāspēj sadarboties. Varoņu ceļš vedīs pāri tuksnešiem, džungļiem, oāzēm un sniegotiem kalniem – vai viņiem maz būs pa spēkam no turienes izkļūt dzīviem?

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montaņezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, sapurināja pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Reiz Holivudā
programme.desc: 1969. gads, Losandželosa. Aktieris Riks Daltons slavu un bagātību ieguva, filmējoties 1950. gadu televīzijas vesternā. Taču nu bijusī zvaigzne piedzīvo skarbu atklāsmi – viņš ir pazudis no Holivudas populāro aktieru radara, un hipiju ēras ziedu laiki viņam ir pilnīgi neizprotama pasaule. Tomēr bijušajai zvaigznei un viņa ilggadējam triku dublierim Klifam Būtam laiskošanos nāksies mest pie malas, lai mēģinātu izsisties strauji mainīgajā Holivudas kino industrijā.

programme.title: Nerunā ļaunu
programme.desc: Kad amerikāņu ģimene tiek uzaicināta pavadīt nedēļas nogali idilliskā lauku īpašumā, kas pieder jaukai britu ģimenei, ar ko viņi iepazinās atvaļinājumā, viss sākas kā bezrūpīgas sapņu brīvdienas un drīz pārvēršas urdošā psiholoģiskā murgā.

programme.title: Lisa Frankenšteina
programme.desc: Mīlas stāsts starp pusaudzi un viņas iemīļoto, un tā iznācis, ka viņš ir... mironis. Šausminošu apstākļu sakritības mīļoto atgriež dzīvē, un abi dodas ceļojumā, lai atrastu mīlestību, laimi un dažas trūkstošās ķermeņa daļas.

programme.title: Sliktie puiši uz mūžu
programme.desc: Sliktie puiši ir atpakaļ! Tiesa gan, viņi dzīvo katrs savu dzīvi. Maikam ir pusmūža krīze, viņš braukā ar sporta automobiļiem un regulāri iekuļas nepatikšanās. Markuss ir nodibinājis ģimeni, kļuvis par policijas inspektoru un arvien biežāk domā par pensionēšanos. Taču, kad pēc Maika dzīvības sāk tīkot noslēpumaini noziedznieki, leģendārais duets atkal apvienojas, lai paveiktu vēl vienu bīstamu misiju.

programme.title: Tilla
programme.desc: 1955. gadā tiek brutāli nolinčots Emerets Tills, un viņa māte zvēr atklāt, ka uzbrukumam ir bijis rasistisks pamats, un dara visu, lai vainīgie tiktu saukti pie atbildības.

programme.title: Neparastā maģija
programme.desc: Stāsts par divām, blakus esošām, bet pilnībā nošķirtām karaļvalstīm – Feju karaļvalsti un Tumšo mežu. Neprātīga pasaka, kurā satiekas raiba kompānija: rūķi, elfi, fejas un velnēni. Viņus visus sagaida raibi piedzīvojumi, pārpratumi un jautrība! Šo trako stāstu izstāstīt palīdzēs vairāku desmitgažu populārākā mūzika.

programme.title: Dusmīgie putni. Filma
programme.desc: Nelidojošie dusmīgie putni joprojām karo ar viltīgajām zaļajām cūkām. Viņi ir ļaunākie ienaidnieki, un, šķiet, nekas nespēs to mainīt. Taču, kad pie apvāršņa parādās jaunas briesmas, kas apdraud viņus visus, putniem un cūkām nāksies apvienoties, lai glābtu savas mājas.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieci. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Semjuels ir tipisks vecpuiša tips – viņš dzīvo šai dienai un par nākotni īpaši nedomā. Kādu dienu viņu pārsteidz Kristīne, sieviete, ar kuru Semjuelam bijis viens nakts sakars, ar zīdaini uz rokām. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir Semjuela meita Glorija, Kristīne dodas prom. Semjuelam nav nekādas intereses audzināt bērnu, tas nekādi nesader ar viņa dzīves veidu. Tomēr izskatās, ka izvēles nav, un pamazām viņš meiteni iemīļo. Viss ir jauki līdz dienai, kad pie durvīm atkal klauvē Glorijas mamma Kristīne.

programme.title: Titāniks
programme.desc: Savā pirmajā braucienā dodas pasaules lielākais kuģis "Titāniks". Uz kuģa klāja tūkstošiem cilvēku ar cerībām un bailēm gaida nokļūšanu galamērķī – Amerikā. Starp šiem cilvēkiem ir nabadzīgs mākslinieks Džeks, kā arī septiņpadsmit gadus vecā Roza – skaista un bagāta meitene, kurai apnikusi vecāku ārišķīgā un liekulīgā pasaule. "Titānika" būvētāji ir pārliecināti par to, ka kuģi nav iespējams nogremdēt, taču, kad kuģa ceļā gadās milzīgs aisbergs, Rozas un Džeka romantiskais piedzīvojums pārvēršas cīņā par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Bladšots
programme.desc: Rejs reiz dzīvoja pavisam citādu dzīvi - līdz nomira. Atguvies uz operāciju galda, viņš neatceras nedz to, kas viņš ir, nedz kur atrodas un kā šeit nokļuvis. Izrādās, iepriekšējā dzīvē Rejs ir bijis jūras kājnieks, kas gājis bojā kaujas laikā. Nu viņš ir pasaulē pirmais cilvēks, kas augšāmcelts no mirušajiem. Atpakaļ dzīvē viņu atgriezusi vistalantīgāko zinātnieku komanda, izmantojot jaunākās nano un biotehnoloģijas. Viņa organismā ievadītie mikroskopiskie nanoroboti vīrieti ir pataisījuši par supercilvēku, biotehnoloģiju brīnumu - viņš pats spēj sevi izārstēt un ir tikpat kā neiznīcināms. Tomēr viņš sāk atcerēties savu iepriekšējo dzīvi, savu nogalināto sievu un viņas slepkavas un grasās atriebties. Taču vai uz šīm atmiņām var paļauties? Vai atriebes kāre ir viņa paša jūtas?

programme.title: Plēsoņa: Laupījums
programme.desc: Ir 17. gadsimts, un jaunā indiāniete Naru vēlas kļūt par izcilu mednieci. Lai arī iesvētību rituālu viņa neiztur, Naru iegūst iespēju sevi pierādīt ātrāk, nekā gaidīts. Medību laikā viņa sastop radījumu, kas nešķiet no šīs pasaules. Jo tālāk viņa seko pēdām, jo ​​skaidrāks kļūst, ka ciltij draud briesmas – daudz bīstamākas par baltajiem iekarotājiem, kuri agresīvi paplašina savu apmetni rietumu virzienā. Pēc tam, kad citplanētietis vienu pēc otra ir nomedījis jaunos, varenos karotājus, paliek tikai Naru, uz kuras pleciem tagad gulstas viņas cilts liktenis.

programme.title: Glābējs
programme.desc: Liktenīgā nelaimes gadījumā zaudējis komandu, leģendārais slīcēju glābējs Bens Rendels dodas vadīt elitāru treniņprogrammu krasta apsardzes slīcēju glābējiem. Pārdzīvojot apkalpes locekļu bojāeju, viņš pilnībā nododas darbam, sagriežot mācību programmu kājām gaisā ar savām netradicionālajām mācību metodēm. Viņš iepazīstas ar jaunu, lecīgu peldēšanas čempionu Džeiku Fišeru, kurš par katru cenu vēlas būt vislabākais. Pēc apmācības beigām Džeiks seko Rendelam uz Kodiaku Aļaskā, kur viņi stājas pretī Beringa jūras briesmām. Kad Džeikam pienāk laiks pašam glābt cilvēkus, viņš no Rendela gūst neatsveramu mācību par to, ko nozīmē patiesa varonība un uzupurēšanās.

programme.title: Stabilizators
programme.desc: Izbijušais kareivis Roberts Makols ir nešaubīgs apspiesto un pakļauto aizstāvis. Kad pasūtījuma slepkavas nogalina viņa bijušo priekšnieci, Stabilizators ķeras pie lietas, lai atriebtu viņas nāvi. Viņam būs jāizrēķinās ar četriem ļoti pieredzējušiem slepkavām, kas ir tikpat labi apmācīti kā viņš. Par laimi, Roberts nekad neko neatstāj pamestu pusratā.

Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A family want to move closer to the kids school in Cocoa Beach, Florida. She wants something thats move-in ready but doesnt mind a few projects.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Pool Kings

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple want to upgrade their current home on Hilton Head Island, South Carolina. Hes looking for more space, while she hopes for water views.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A New Jersey couple are ready to escape the cold weather to the warmer climate of Hilton Head Island. They hope to find a home with a water view.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: The Blumbergs transform a Victorian funeral parlour into their dream home. But strange and unexplained noises have them questioning their decision.

programme.title: We Bought A Funeral Home
programme.desc: Living through a funeral home renovation proves to be nerve-racking. Plus, the old embalming area is turned into a speakeasy with a luxe cigar lounge.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack McBrayer tours Americas wackiest homes on the real estate market, learning about the sellers and buyers who call these quirky abodes home.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A growing family hunts for a cosy log cabin near the Blue Ridge Mountains. They hope to find the perfect retreat in the quaint town of Ellijay, GA.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A couple want to escape the Phoenix Metro area for a quiet life in Show Low, Arizona. They look for a spacious log cabin in the White Mountains.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International

Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Battle on the Beach
programme.desc: Three skilled teams hit the beach to renovate identical beachfront properties. With some help from Ty Pennington, Alison Victoria and Taniya Nayak, theyll compete to wow the judges with their home remodels and walk away with a $50,000 cash prize!

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Ugliest House In America
programme.desc: A concrete cave better suited for children, a former bank and an outdated brick house that looks like a pizza place compete for a $150,000 makeover.

programme.title: Ugliest House In America
programme.desc: A house that looks like a boat, a home with carpet up the walls and a place that looks like a UFO compete for a $150,000 makeover.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A family is ready to give up surfside California for the Colorado River in Arizona. They love boats, jet skis and want plenty of space for their toys.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: After creating their renovated bedroom in the Bell Tower, Daphne and Ian transform a water-damaged room into a bathing chamber worthy of royalty.

programme.title: Home Town Takeover
programme.desc: Ben and Erin renovate the home of a local family health advocate. Plus, downtown Sebrings main park gets a refresh.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: He was the first Public Enemy Number One--the legendary outlaw John Dillinger. His life consisted of brazen bank robberies across the country, but his death remains shrouded in mystery. What really happened to John Dillinger?

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.
