programme.title: KaralisTe
programme.desc: Raidījumu veido studija VFS Films un atbalsta Latvijas vides aizsardzības fonds, Swedbank un Latvijas valsts meži. Raidījuma sadarbības partneri ir Neste, Bauskas alus, Volvo un žurnāls IR.

programme.title: Izziņas impulss
programme.desc: Lai arī zinātne var likties kas tāls un sarežģīts, patiesībā tā ir aizraujošs stāsts par mums pašiem. Raidījums "Izziņas Impulss" izgaismos zinātni no visdažādākajām pusēm, gan dodoties uz vietām, kur tālu no civilizācijas notiek noslēpumaini eksperimenti un mūžīgajā sasalumā meklējamas senu laikmetu liecības, gan tepat tuvumā, palūkojoties uz lietām, kas ietekmē mūsu ikdienu. Aizraujošā domas un izziņas ceļojumā kopā ar pašmāju un citu valstu pētniekiem vedīs Sandra Kropa, neaizmirstot par to, ka sarežģīto var skaidrot vienkārši – dažkārt piemērus meklējot pat virtuvē.

programme.title: Piedzīvojums dabā
programme.desc: Piedzīvojumu meklētājs Jānis Kļaviņš dodas jaunajā un vēl nezināmajā, izpētot dabu pārgājienos. Cilvēks ir viena no vides sastāvdaļām, kas veido to kopumu. Ar piemēriem vēlamies parādīt, kā cilvēks var, veiksmīgi integrējoties vidē, vadīt savu saimniecisko darbību. Veidot cilvēku izpratni, dodoties Latvijas dabā, izglītojot un informējot iespējami plašu sabiedrības daļu par dažādo ekosistēmu un sniedzot praktiskus padomus, kā izmantot dabas resursus, nepiesārņojot un saglabājot vides kvalitāti.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The 1972 Munich Olympics holds significant promise, offering a chance to showcase a new Germany to a post-WWII world. However, this hopeful beginning meets a tragic end on September 5 at just after 4:00 AM when Palestinian terrorists kill two Israeli athletes and capture 9 others. As police struggle to handle the crisis, the terrorists anticipate their every move. By 1:30 AM on 6 September, the fighting finally stops, and all of the athletes, five terrorists and one German police officer are dead. With the circumstances behind the polices actions shrouded in mystery, one athletes wife vows to uncover the truth. An anonymous source begins sending her copies of a classified German report investigating the police protocol. With the help of a hostage crisis expert who analyzes more than 3,000 files, the pieces of the puzzle begin to fit together. Supplemented by expert testimony, eye-witness and family member interviews, this gripping one-hour recount answers the most critical questions: How did the terrorists break into the Olympic village; how did the polices rescue plot go so terribly wrong; and how could this have been prevented?

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: In 1960 construction of Europes tallest dam is completed in in the Vajont Valley in Northern Italy - the jewel in the crown of an ambitious hydro-electric generation scheme. But as the new reservoir fills, a vast section of mountainside is dislodged and creeps toward the lake. The power company know the landslide has the potential to cause a devastating tsunami if it hits the water at speed, so they develop a plan to ease the landslide down by adjusting the level of the lake. For three years there are no problems, but in October 1963, the landslide suddenly accelerates - and slams into the reservoir as fast as a formula one car - creating a tsunami 200 meters high which overtops the dam and swamps the valley below - killing more than 2000 people. Seconds from Disaster reveals the systematic errors that led to tragedy - and sheds new light on the landslide mechanism that has intrigued scientists for 50 years.

programme.title: Situation Critical
programme.desc: Situation Critical is an American documentary series produced in partnership with the National Geographic Channel and explores devastating disasters and violent conflicts. In some cases these events changed more than the lives of those involved, altering the course of modern history. Among the events featured in this series are a North Hollywood shootout between Los Angeles Police Department and a pair of bank robbers, a Unites States Air Force pilot that is shot down over Bosnia and struggles to evade capture and several military operations that took place in the Middle East following the invasion of American forces.

programme.title: Situation Critical
programme.desc: Situation Critical is an American documentary series produced in partnership with the National Geographic Channel and explores devastating disasters and violent conflicts. In some cases these events changed more than the lives of those involved, altering the course of modern history. Among the events featured in this series are a North Hollywood shootout between Los Angeles Police Department and a pair of bank robbers, a Unites States Air Force pilot that is shot down over Bosnia and struggles to evade capture and several military operations that took place in the Middle East following the invasion of American forces.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Apollo 13 really explode 200,000 miles from Earth? What caused the devastating fire that swept through the MGM Grand in Las Vegas? Why could the world famous Ponte Morandi bridge in Italy simply collapse and kill 43 people?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Worlds Toughest Fixes is going to new heights … tackling fixes that cant be reached by ladder, lift or crane. From the top of the Hoover Dam … to the cliffs near Niagara Falls … Rileys going to join the workers who take on the ultimate death-defying jobs. Hell help replace an old shock absorber way out over the edge of Las Vegass tallest building … patch a turbine blade hundreds of feet above the ground … and clear away rocks on a cliff face that overlooks the one of the worlds most famous falls. One things for sure - working at such extreme heights will give Riley a new appreciation for standing on solid ground.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Batten down the hatches and strap on your hard hat as Worlds Toughest Fixes joins a crew of 1200 as they haul a leaking luxury liner out of the water and fix it. The 856-foot long cruise ship has just about the biggest problem a ship can face: shes taking on water. And no one knows exactly whats leaking. Riley heads to San Francisco Bay where hundreds of workers have just 15 days to tear this mega ship apart, dive into the belly of the beast and find the leak. Theyll have to work around the clock to fix it because in just two weeks 2000 new guests whove paid for the vacation of a lifetime will be ready to set to sea. Therell be a lot of disappointed vacationers demanding their money back if the ship isnt fixed on time. Reputations and a boat-load of money are on the line.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Riley buys a ticket and joins the crowd. A million commuters… scurrying to and from work… Its a typical day in the fifth largest mass transit system in the USA… and theres a train due somewhere every few seconds. Behind the scenes, the action is even more frantic as thousands of workers struggle to keep this huge system up and running 24/7. Transit controllers, operators, mechanics, electricians, communications experts… all working to monitor, co-ordinate and repair, the thousands of trains, buses, and trolleys that make up this incredibly complex transport matrix.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Fresh from nine months training at the Border Force Academy, Labrador Warner faces his first day on the job as a drug sniffer. Security managers test their screening teams by trying to smuggle a fake bomb past them. Annie faces her moment of truth. Will she pass the test and become a qualified Screening Officer?

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Sydney is experiencing one of the rainiest seasons on record. With violent storms closing down 2 runways, an incoming flight relays a distress call to the Integrated Operations Centre. A man has suffered an apparent heart attack on board. Will the plane be able to land in this weather? Later, a fire training drill turns into a real emergency as an on board fire is reported from another plane.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With weekend vacationers and commuters returning home, Friday is always a busy day at the airport. More passengers means more problems, keeping the Duty Managers on high alert. Today its an air ambulance emergency, security breaches, illegal drugs and a shouting passenger facing a ban from the airline shes booked to fly on.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: When the human remains of a female are uncovered near Vejle, Denmark, an archeologist begins detailing a fantastic tale of who she was and why she was murdered, linking her to ancient sagas and even King Harald Bluetooth! But as the archeology study evolves, a rival archeologist has another theory on whose body this is and why her death occurred in the first place.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Human remains are pulled up from the depths of a peat bog near Yde, Netherlands. Some locals believe it is the work of the devilstrands of shocking fire-red hair stream from the ground, sending them fleeing in fear. But as archeologists study the human remains further, they realize they belong to a young woman whose death is more chilling than they ever imagined.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: A convicted serial killer, Larry Eyler, confessed to the murder of more than 20 men across Illinois and Indiana in the 1980s. But several of his victims remained unidentified for decades. Now, after years of frustrated efforts, Newton County Coroner Scott McCord enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and identify one of the last unknown victims and return him to his family.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: Earth protects itself from the sun. The David and Goliath story of Earths relationship with its greatest threat, our seemingly benign Sun. The Sun is the big violent boss of the Solar System throwing out devastating particles and deadly radiation. Without several shields, one generated by our unique planetary core, another by our atmosphere, and a third by our interconnected weather systems, life on Earth would never have survived.

programme.title: Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Its a typically vibrant New Orleans summer when Hurricane Katrina looms. Sitting in the bullseye of a Category 5, the city faces a reality check. With a delayed evacuation order, many are trapped and forced to brace for the storms fury. Residents recount for the first time how they navigated the impending disaster, capturing the harrowing experience of preparing for "The Big One."

programme.title: Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time
programme.desc: After Hurricane Katrina passed, citizens soon discovered the levees breached, quickly flooding New Orleans like a bathtub. First responders and everyday citizens jumped in heroically to save locals; many residents were forced to flee their houses for dry land. As residents braved dangerous conditions to survive, ineptitude at all levels of government was exposed as the water rose.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations Puerto Rico arrest 37 members of a smuggling network responsible for multiple murders, and the import and export of cocaine on the island. Air and Marine operations agents in Mayaguez chase after a loaded vessel with $5.4 million in cocaine onboard. AMO agents in Fajardo investigate a party boat and discover a passenger on board entered the country illegally.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations arrest multiple suspects across Puerto Rico involved in a drug smuggling ring linked to multiple murders. Air and Marine Operations agents in Fajardo seize$13.2 million worth of cocaine from an overturned vessel, while AMO agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands conduct a night operation to intercept smuggling vessels moving between the USVI and British Virgin Islands.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: A convicted serial killer, Larry Eyler, confessed to the murder of more than 20 men across Illinois and Indiana in the 1980s. But several of his victims remained unidentified for decades. Now, after years of frustrated efforts, Newton County Coroner Scott McCord enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and identify one of the last unknown victims and return him to his family.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: Tuesday, September 11, 2001, a temperate and nearly cloudless morning over the eastern United States. Millions of men and women ready themselves for work. Among them is an air traffic controller in Boston, Mass. Based on sheer intuition, he will break all protocol this morning, alerting the Air Force that a potential disaster is unfolding on his radar screen. Air Force Colonel Bob Marr, commander NEADS (North East Air Defense Sector] will scramble all he has to try and avert a catastrophe - but it will consist of only two F-15s that begin "searching for a needle in a haystack". Meanwhile, a group of 19 young men armed with simple box cutters literally fly under the radar into the World Trade Center , The Pentagon, and a Pennsylvania field. From the viewpoint of these two key theaters of action, Air Traffic Control and the U.S. Air Force, "Seconds From Disaster: 9/11" deconstructs, second-by-second, the tragic events and security lapses that led to the worst attacks on American soil since Pearl Harbor. The episode contains chilling testimony from the Air Force Colonel Bob Marr , Air Traffic Controller Dave Bottiglia, Ben Sliney, the man who makes the call to ground all the planes in the air over the U.S. and John Farmer Senior Counsel for the Presidential Commission. The question has to be asked: even on the day, could 9/11 been stopped?

programme.title: Notre Dame: Race Against the Inferno
programme.desc: On 15th April 2019, during Holy Monday Mass, the worlds most famous cathedral caught fire. Notre-Dame de Paris was ablaze in minutes, as an epic battle unfolded for heroic French firefighters. Under the gaze of the worlds media, they fought the inferno for more than 15 hours. Exclusive footage and interviews bring vividly to life the moment-by-moment courage of the Paris fire and police services, as they put their lives on the line to save this historic building.

programme.title: The Next Mega Tsunami
programme.desc: Ten years after one of the most deadly tsunamis ever known, scientists are making a shocking discovery. Experts used to believe that the biggest killer waves were only generated in a handful of regions.

programme.title: Real Time Disaster
programme.desc: On the 10th of May 2013, a giant wave of ice ripped through homes in the small community of Ochre Beach in Manitoba, Canada. One day later, south of the boarder at Lake Millie Lacs in the United States, another strange moving wall of ice made landfall at Izatys Resort. This rare major ice shove was caught on camera. Harnessing this incredible footage we can now get closer than ever to one of natures strangest events, explore the forces at work and reveal a unique perspective on the destructive power of ice in motion.

programme.title: Real Time Disaster
programme.desc: At 9:20am on the 15th of February 2013, in the Siberian city of Chelyabinsk something, not of this world was spotted blazing its way through the morning skies. In this episode we tell the story of the 2013 Chelyabinsk Meteorite strike through the incredible footage of the event, captured by those who actually witnessed it. Well use this remarkable amateur video to unpack the science and explore where the meteorite came from, its violent end and how it unleashed a force equivalent to thirty Hiroshima bombs on the unsuspecting Russian city.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana investigates a deadly new fentanyl cocktail called "tranq dope" thats devastating American users. Shes spent her career covering the deadly waves of the countrys opioid crisis, but shes never seen it this bad. Seeking answers, she heads to Sinaloa, the heart of Mexicos cartel land, to get answers, and makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: A Homeland Security Investigations stakeout in San Diego leads to a car chase, a takedown and the discovery of nearly $500K in meth and fentanyl. In El Paso, Customs and Border Protection uncovers bundles of cash and bricks of cocaine concealed in vehicles crossing the border. And in Philadelphia, Customs and Border Protection cracks down on undeclared merchandise on international flights, uncovering thousands of dollars in suspected counterfeit goods from Turkey.

Today its an air ambulance emergency, security breaches, illegal drugs and a shouting passenger facing a ban from the airline shes booked to fly on.

programme.title: Building Impossible with Daniel Ashville
programme.desc: Daniel joins teams in both Austria and Italy to help shore, bore, and blast to help build one of the longest underground rail connections in the world. In Austria he blasts through the bedrock with dynamite and in Italy he controls a massive tunnel boring machine as the two countries get close to meeting in the middle.

programme.title: Building Impossible with Daniel Ashville
programme.desc: Daniel travels to Las Vegas, where Madison Square Gardens building a massive sphere. Its a game-changing venue, where audiences will experience amazing shows both inside - and outside the screen-covered sphere. Daniel joins the crew as they lift and bolt LED mega-panels to spheres exterior. But inside, Daniel must scale horrifying heights to get the job done.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: War...Weather...and human error have led to some of the worst maritime disasters in US history. But imagine if we could empty the oceans, letting the water drain away to reveal these secrets of Americas sea floor. Pearl Harbor, who fired the first shot? What are the dangerous forces that make Alcatraz and the San Francisco Bay so deadly? And how did drilling for oil result in one of the biggest environmental disasters in US history? Drained dry we reveal these sunken mysteries along Americas shores.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Nero is Romes most famous villain - but what is the truth behind the myths? This season archaeologists reveal the stunning new discovery of Neros private theatre in the heart of Rome, once thought to only exist in ancient texts and legend. Experts explore Neros birthplace and excavate Roman tombs to trace his collision course with the senate that spelled his doom and sealed his place in infamy.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The Roman Empire dominated millions of miles of land - and sea. What secrets powered its rule over the waves for four centuries? We follow archaeologists as they plunge underwater to excavate a newly discovered 1st-century Roman shipwreck, explore long-lost ports in Italys bay of Naples, and reconstruct and race two ancient Roman ships to unravel the maritime mastery that anchored an empire.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Archaeologists embark on new digs in Pompeii, to unravel the stories of the people that lived and died here. They race against the clock to unearth a sacrificial skull, uncover clues from the tomb and mummified body of a curiously wealthy freed slave, and venture into stiflingly narrow tunnels beneath the central bathhouse.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Buried beneath Rome lies a forgotten treasure: the Golden House - a vast palace built in the first century AD. It was the most extravagant construction in the history of Rome. Why was it buried? And what can its fate reveal about its builder - Romes most notorious emperor - Nero? As experts race to save the remains of the Golden House, archaeologists uncover new clues to its fate and its connection to Neros reputation.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With flames emerging through the cockpit floor, the pilots of Pilgrim Airlines 458 are desperate to land. Amid smoke, extreme heat and zero visibility, they somehow manage to touch down on a frozen Rhode Island reservoir. Within minutes, the inferno destroys any evidence of how the fire started. And with no data recorder, its a surviving pilot who ultimatley gives investigators the break they need.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: August 16th, 1987 Northwest Airlines Flight #255 is on the tarmac at Detroit Metropolitan Airport. The pilots are bound for Phoenix, Arizona, but first they have to find their runway. Controllers have given them a last minute change and the pilots are having a hard time locating the entrance to their runway. Finally, 45 minutes behind schedule, the pilots taxi the DC-9 into position. The airplane is soon roaring down the runway at 95 miles an hour (150 kilometers and hour). Captain John Maus pulls back on his control column, but the plane barely manages to get off the ground before it hits a light pole, slams into a building, and disintegrates on a highway. This is the second-deadliest airplane disaster in US history... But can investigators determine what went wrong?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Arrow Air Flight #1285 DC-8 December 12th, 1985 - After a six-month peace-keeping mission in the Middle East, 248 elite American soldiers are on their way home for the holidays. Destined for Fort Campbell, Kentucky, they are travelling on Arrow Air Flight #1285, a charter air carrier contracted by the military to transport troops. En route from Cairo, the DC-8 eventually touches down for a routine refueling stop in Gander, Newfoundland. But just seconds after taking off again for the last leg of its journey, the plane loses airspeed and altitude and crashes into a heavily wooded area just south of the runway. An unprecedented disaster, it is one of the deadliest aviation accidents of all time and the resulting investigation ignites a storm of controversy that continues to this day.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Pompeii was a thriving town on the southern coast of Italy, until it came to a sudden end in 79AD. The eruption of a nearby volcano, Mount Vesuvius, erupted, burying the city in millions of tonnes of ash and debris. Now excavators are digging to unearth the dark side of this idyllic Roman town by uncovering an enslaved persons room.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Nero is Romes most famous villain - but what is the truth behind the myths? This season archaeologists reveal the stunning new discovery of Neros private theatre in the heart of Rome, once thought to only exist in ancient texts and legend. Experts explore Neros birthplace and excavate Roman tombs to trace his collision course with the senate that spelled his doom and sealed his place in infamy.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The Roman Empire dominated millions of miles of land - and sea. What secrets powered its rule over the waves for four centuries? We follow archaeologists as they plunge underwater to excavate a newly discovered 1st-century Roman shipwreck, explore long-lost ports in Italys bay of Naples, and reconstruct and race two ancient Roman ships to unravel the maritime mastery that anchored an empire.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Archaeologists embark on new digs in Pompeii, to unravel the stories of the people that lived and died here. They race against the clock to unearth a sacrificial skull, uncover clues from the tomb and mummified body of a curiously wealthy freed slave, and venture into stiflingly narrow tunnels beneath the central bathhouse.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Buried beneath Rome lies a forgotten treasure: the Golden House - a vast palace built in the first century AD. It was the most extravagant construction in the history of Rome. Why was it buried? And what can its fate reveal about its builder - Romes most notorious emperor - Nero? As experts race to save the remains of the Golden House, archaeologists uncover new clues to its fate and its connection to Neros reputation.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Archeologists in Egypts Valley of the Nobles unwrap the secret lives of people from the ancient past, including a royal nurse, two children and a woman who served the rich and famous. One-hundred miles from the Valley of the Kings, the Valley of the Nobles is a thousand years older and far less-explored. It contains one of the largest enclaves of intact tombs in Egypt. Two teams of archeologists hit the jackpot as they uncover mummies and artifacts no one has seen for 4,000 years!

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Meet the bada#$ queens of ancient Egypt as archeologists read between the hieroglyphs to find the true stories of Cleopatra and Hatshepsut. Of all the hidden mysteries of Egypt, the lives of these queens who would be king are among the most compelling. Immensely powerful, they created larger-than-life legends that have withstood the test of time. Now, archeologists seek to uncover their secrets ?such as where Cleopatra is buried. Even after two millennia, a sandstorm of mystery will swirls around her life? and her story lives on.

programme.title: The Lost Tomb of Alexander the Great
programme.desc: Archaeologist Pepi Papakosta is on a mission to find Alexander the Greats lost tomb. Excavating in a public garden in the center of the city he founded 2300 years ago, Alexandria, Egypt, she has discovered a rare, marble statue of Alexander, Greek treasures, and secret tunnels. But Pepis biggest find is an extraordinary discovery even she was not expecting.

programme.title: Lost Continent of the Pacific
programme.desc: Legends of lost civilizations have captivated people throughout time. During the Age of Discovery, explorers searched the Pacific in vain for a mysterious land they called "terra incognita" or "unknown land." To this day, the elders on Easter Island claim their ancestors came from a continent called Hiva, believed to have sunk after a great disaster. Now, new scientific evidence points to a remote island chain in Polynesia as the center of an ancient, thriving civilization. For over 400 years these islands have been known as the Marquesas Archipelago, but before that the native Polynesians called them simply "The Isles of Hiva". Could they be a remnant of the lost continent of Hiva? Using new archeological and geological evidence together with oral tradition and voyaging techniques passed down for centuries, we are unveiling The Lost Continent Of The Pacific: a world of water and exploration, of human sacrifice and epic voyagers who had settled the largest ocean on Earth centuries before Columbus reached America.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: War...Weather...and human error have led to some of the worst maritime disasters in US history. But imagine if we could empty the oceans, letting the water drain away to reveal these secrets of Americas sea floor. Pearl Harbor, who fired the first shot? What are the dangerous forces that make Alcatraz and the San Francisco Bay so deadly? And how did drilling for oil result in one of the biggest environmental disasters in US history? Drained dry we reveal these sunken mysteries along Americas shores.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans

Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Frozen Islands
programme.desc: It may be inhabitable for humans, but the icy ocean and frozen islands of the sub-antarctic region are home to millions of marine animals that have adapted to this testing environment. In this two-part series from National Geographic, the constant struggle for a wide variety of species is revealed, as they battle the elements and other dangers in a bid for survival. From penguins to seals, and albatrosses to whales, we showcase how these unique species live, breed and feed in the biting waters, which are also prowled by some of the most dangerous, underwater predators on our planet.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the savannah turns into a battleground, its hard to choose a hero. Were on the edge of our safari seats as a leopard is cornered by a pride of lions, a young impala is hurled into the air by a hippo and two hyenas try to drown each other. Then, the rarest of sightings as an Aardvark runs for its life from a brown hyaena. Who will win when its tooth versus claw?

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: A land full of extreme environments and teeming with iconic wildlife, Africa holds a fascination like no other continent. This series takes the viewer on a journey from harsh desert landscapes to towering peaks, and from vast, sprawling grasslands to raging river torrents. The three episodes cover the mist-covered jungles and mountains of Rwanda and the great apes who call it home; the largest desert in the world, the Sahara, where the scarcity of water and food make life a daily challenge for the creatures who compete for them; and the cradle of humanity, Ethiopia, a weather-ravaged land full of natural beauty and unique wildlife.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols are preparing for sheep to give birth, which means figuring out how to catch and shear their four Merino ewes - no small task as this is new territory for everyone except Dr. Pol. Then, while helping his dad on a farm call, Charles has a terrifying accident. The whole family rallies together to care for Charles and take care of the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its been a year of farming for the Pol family. Even with Charles recovering from his injury, the farms showing no signs of slowing down! Beth takes the next step with her bees to grow the colony and harvest honey. Charles and Ben come up with a final fix for the sheep huts drainage problem. The whole family comes together to plant the garden and celebrate a successful year on the farm.

programme.title: Amazonia
programme.desc: Explore the incredible wildlife of the Amazon rainforest. It is one of the most amazing natural environments on the planet, inhabited by a huge variety of animal species, including jaguars, otters, tarantulas, eagles, dolphins and more. Join to see what goes on in the jungle.

programme.title: Amazonia
programme.desc: The boto dolphin and the giant otter are some of the inhabitants of lagoons and flooded forests. In this world, the Amazon rushes then recedes as the rainforests terrestrial and aquatic realms battle for dominance.

programme.title: Amazonia
programme.desc: Explore the incredible wildlife of the Amazon rainforest. It is one of the most amazing natural environments on the planet, inhabited by a huge variety of animal species, including jaguars, otters, tarantulas, eagles, dolphins and more. Join to see what goes on in the jungle.

programme.title: Amazonia
programme.desc: The boto dolphin and the giant otter are some of the inhabitants of lagoons and flooded forests. In this world, the Amazon rushes then recedes as the rainforests terrestrial and aquatic realms battle for dominance.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Tree Climbing Lions
programme.desc: Big cat biologist Alexander Braczkowski is on a mission. Hes got 90 days to count lions in Uganda and learn how the population is doing. But these arent ordinary lions. The prides in Queen Elizabeth National Park spend most of their lives up in the trees, a rare and mysterious behavior unique to this part of Africa.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Return of the Predators
programme.desc: After 30 years of war and destruction, Gorongosa National Park in Mozambique has undergone a remarkable restoration. Herbivores once again bound across the plains, but hunters have been slower to return, leaving the park out of balance...until now!

programme.title: Ultimate Rivals: Cats vs Dogs
programme.desc: Canines and felines have been living side by side in Africa for hundreds of thousands of years, and theyve never really gotten along-not even amongst themselves. Throw the hyena into the mix and theyre all nightmare neighbors? Stealing from each other; harassing each other; eating each others young. Avoidance might be the only way to stay alive. Cats, dogs and the wild-card hyena, all jousting in a free for all for survival.

programme.title: Planet Carnivore: Perfect Killers
programme.desc: Great white sharks, polar bears, lions and brown bears battle rivals and the elements to maintain their positions at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pols are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time - and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: After getting the tractor stuck in mud, Charles and Ben need a quick solution to plant hayseed in their field to provide food for their incoming animals. The Pol family must quickly figure out why their field is so wet even though it hasnt rained in days. Meanwhile, Dr. Pol helps Charles and Beth set up their first beehive colonies on the new farm.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles "The Superzeros," a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. Forget about the cheetahs speed and the eagles eyesight; and say hello to the invisible glass frog, the indestructible honey badger and the might of the pistol shrimp who can fire bubbles hotter than the sun.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs. From a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop, its uncertain if they bad parents or just misunderstood. But no matter how bad one thinks they may be at parenting; they cant be as bad as these guys.

programme.title: Dr Oakley: Yukon Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Michelle Oakley and her adventures around her home base of Haines Junction, Yukon and Haines, Alaska. Dr. Oakley is a full-time vet, devoted Mom of three daughters and a wife. Join her every day routine as she helps all kinds of animals and birds- wild and domestic, big and small in a far away part of the world, very often in super remote areas. Dr. Oakley is doing her duty in very tough conditions, but she is doing it brilliantly, with all her heart.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements. From the bombardier beetles boiling spray to the mantis shrimps explosive club and the draco lizards hidden wings, meet natures awesome secret weapons.

programme.title: Underdogs

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan shares his distinct take on the underdogs using gross-out tactics to win the game of life. With manatees using flatulence to control their buoyancy to cave-dwelling fungus gnats creating beautifully illuminated flytraps with mucus from their butts, these underdogs are out to prove who may be the grossest survivor of them all.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Forget the birds and the bees, Ryan reveals the steps to finding "the one," underdog style. From first attraction in giant-nosed proboscis monkeys to the importance of wingmen in turkey courtship or even foreplay with flying foxes, these animals are rewriting the rule book on messy and complicated relationships in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds puts the spotlight on the underdogs who get ahead by dishonest means. From the master-of-disguise frogfish to a butt-biting jackal and a multiheaded caterpillar playing the decoy, they are the masters of deception and deceit. And bringing all these hustlers together is the greatest con artist of them all - a cunning macaque who feeds on the spoils from unsuspecting tourists.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Reality series following husband and wife veterinarians Ben and Erin Schroeder as they tend to animals in rural Nebraska. In this picturesque corner of the midwestern state, doctors Ben and Erin do all they can to ensure the local animals get the attention and care they deserve. Braving fierce blizzards, treacherous tornados and scorching summers, the pair of veterinarians let nothing stop them from administering medical treatment to local livestock.

programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Reality series following husband and wife veterinarians Ben and Erin Schroeder as they tend to animals in rural Nebraska. In this picturesque corner of the midwestern state, doctors Ben and Erin do all they can to ensure the local animals get the attention and care they deserve. Braving fierce blizzards, treacherous tornados and scorching summers, the pair of veterinarians let nothing stop them from administering medical treatment to local livestock.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles "The Superzeros," a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. Forget about the cheetahs speed and the eagles eyesight; and say hello to the invisible glass frog, the indestructible honey badger and the might of the pistol shrimp who can fire bubbles hotter than the sun.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements. From the bombardier beetles boiling spray to the mantis shrimps explosive club and the draco lizards hidden wings, meet natures awesome secret weapons.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs. From a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop, its uncertain if they bad parents or just misunderstood. But no matter how bad one thinks they may be at parenting; they cant be as bad as these guys.

programme.title: Dr Oakley: Yukon Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Michelle Oakley and her adventures around her home base of Haines Junction, Yukon and Haines, Alaska. Dr. Oakley is a full-time vet, devoted Mom of three daughters and a wife. Join her every day routine as she helps all kinds of animals and birds- wild and domestic, big and small in a far away part of the world, very often in super remote areas. Dr. Oakley is doing her duty in very tough conditions, but she is doing it brilliantly, with all her heart.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Kad Viljams adoptē jūras cūciņu Našķi, rodas vairāk problēmu, nekā Viljams gaidīja.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Uz Padingtonu lielu iespaidu atstāj ugunsdzēsēju runa par drošību. Kad notiek īsta nelaime, Padingtons steidz palīgā. Mateo un Džūdija nodibina slepenu klubu koka mājā, bet liedz Džonatanam un Padingtonam tajā iestāties bez paroles.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Briežu komanda atgriezusies ar jauniem, neticamiem piedzīvojumiem un varonīgām glābšanas misijām. Trešajā sezonā drosmīgā komanda uzzina vairāk par brīnišķīgo visumu, atklāj neticamo Mirdzumu salu un izpēta Mirdzumu jūras dzelmi.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pievienojieties Padingtonam, kurš kļūst par pirmo lāčunautu, pateicoties Braunu ģimenei. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons salasa dārzā visas kazenes, bet Karija kungs uzskata, ka dažas pienākas viņam. Vai tā ir jāatdod?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons priecājas par pilsētas saimniecības atklāšanu, bet dzīvnieki aizbēg, kad viņš atstāj vaļā vārtus. Vai dzīvniekus pagūs atrast? Bāzs māca Džonatanam un Padingtonam par atkārtoto izmantošanu. Vai par veikumu viņi saņems balvu?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija raizējas, ka izsmēluši suņa Lakija veiksmi. Kā viņi pateiks to Sofijai? Pie Bāza ciemojas brāļameita Simija. Viņš grib pārsteigt meiteni ar ideālu picu, bet tas nebūs viegli izsalkušo dzīvnieku dēļ.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija burtiski pazaudē zobu. Vai to atradīs pirms likšanās uz auss, un vai zobu fejai garšos marmelāde? Padingtons kļūst par darba lāci un palīdz Brauna kungam mājas birojā, bet uzzina, ka datori mēdz niķoties.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Superhaizivs un Kapteinis Aļģe jeb Haizivs Mazulis un Viljams glābs rotaļu laiku, bet vai Kapteinis Aļģe ir tikai palīgs? // Haizivs Mazulis adoptē sīciņu mājas mīluli, bet vai viņš ir gatavs lielajai atbildībai?

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Penija Piraija izdomā jaunus noteikumus, lai nekad nezaudētu ūdenskvadrāta spēlē.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā. Barbapapas sodas jaunā piedzīvojumā... dārzā. Taču dzīvot dabā ir negaidīti sarežģīti.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Mazais Šefpavāriņš rīko pavārmākslas šovu un ar saviem labākajiem draugiem Oliju, Rūbiju un Henriju gatavo gardus ēdienus un brīnišķīgus piedzīvojumus. Mazais šefpavārs dalās ar draugiem maltītēs un pieliek mīlestību katrā gatavotajā ēdienā.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Tērauds netīšam ar augšanas staru trāpa Stjū un Safijas kāmim, kas kļūst par milzīgu un biedējošu kāmi. Tērauds un Pūciņas kundze iesaistās tīrīšanas robotu sacensībās, kurās Kajs panāk, ka Botlers kļūst par tīrīgāko robotu pilsētā

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir auksta un vējaina diena. Parkā visas lapas kļuvušas sarkanas un dzeltenas. Ir tik vējains, ka Pepas bumba tiek iepūsta dīķi un Džordža cepure nonāk kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimene skatās "Detektīvu Kartupeli". Arī Pepa un Džordžs grib būt detektīvi. Tētis uzdod viņiem atrisināt mistēriju. Tedijs ir paslēpts, un Pepai kopā ar Džordžu jāizmanto palielināmais stikls, lai sekotu drupaču takai un atrisinātu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs spēlējas ar burbuļiem. Kad beidzas maisījums, tētis parāda, kā rādīt lielus burbuļus ar vecu tenisa raketi un ziepju ūdeni. Tad izveido lielu dubļu peļķi, kurā visi var izpriecāties.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir laiks doties pie miera, Pepai un Džordžam ir jāiet vannā. Pēc tam viņi izmazgā zobus un lien gultā. Drīz vien viņi aizmieg. Mamma un tētis beidzot apsēžas, bet ir bijusi gara diena un arī viņi ir miegaini.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Cetnieklīča svētkos dziedās Sjerra Spīdošā, un vajadzīgi jauni instrumenti.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Superhaizivs un Kapteinis Aļģe jeb Haizivs Mazulis un Viljams glābs rotaļu laiku, bet vai Kapteinis Aļģe ir tikai palīgs? // Haizivs Mazulis adoptē sīciņu mājas mīluli, bet vai viņš ir gatavs lielajai atbildībai?

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā. Barbapapas sodas jaunā piedzīvojumā... dārzā. Taču dzīvot dabā ir negaidīti sarežģīti.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Mazais Šefpavāriņš rīko pavārmākslas šovu un ar saviem labākajiem draugiem Oliju, Rūbiju un Henriju gatavo gardus ēdienus un brīnišķīgus piedzīvojumus. Mazais šefpavārs dalās ar draugiem maltītēs un pieliek mīlestību katrā gatavotajā ēdienā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa

Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Kad knābaloži apēd visas elotes, Dora un Zābaciņš dodas meklēt jaunas sastāvdaļas Vecmammu pavārkonkursa receptei. Dora, Zābaciņš un Mugursoma meklē Karti piedzīvojumiem bagātā paslēpju spēlē.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Mazulis, Viljams un Goldija palīdz "Viduslaiku bēguma" zivij atkal iemīlēt aktiermākslu.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Sera Tērauda izdarības zem ūdens izraisa nemierus vaļu vidū. Briežu komandai pēc nemieriem jāatrod vaļu mazulis. Džeida uziet neparastus pēdu nospiedumus, kas varētu būt Ledus troļļa. Lai veiktu izmeklēšanu, viņa sauc palīgā Briežu komandu.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauniem ir jauni kaimiņi, un Toka stāsta, ka dārzā ir goblins, un viņas tētis ir astronauts! Tā taču nav tiesa, vai ne? Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija nolēmuši veidot avīzi, bet viņiem vajag stāstu titullapai!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Grūbera kungs izdara labu Padingtonam un saka, ka viņš var pateikties, izdarot labu kādam citam. Tas ir grūtāk nekā izklausās! Padingtons uzzina par kompostēšanu, pateicoties Mulča kungam. Vai viņš paspēs izaudzēt puķes tantei Lūsijai?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons mācās par bitēm un nolemj palīdzēt tām ražot medu, iestādot puķes, bet kāds domā, ka tās ir nezāles! Vindzoras dārzos ir karstuma vilnis, Mateo izpārdevis visus saldējumus, tāpēc viņš kopā ar Padingtonu rada jaunu garšu!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons savaino celi un dodas pie Dr. Jasmīnas. Kad viņa iziet, viņš tiek sajaukts ar ārstu. Vai Brauna kunga pidžamu ballīte atbildīs Brauna kundzes standartiem, kad Simi un Toka paliks pa nakti?

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Kad zemūdens vētra izjauc Haizivs Mazuļa un Viljama jautrību, viņi šaubās, vai spēs izklaidēties iekštelpās. Viljams un Vola piedalās jauno zinātnieku konkursā, un viņu sacensību gars rada neparastu situāciju.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Mazulis un Viljams palīdz Saltummīlim nogaršot jaunus ēdienus Plēsēju līča ēstuvēs.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Mazais Šefpavāriņš gatavo ābola pīrāgu konkursam, un pēc negadījuma viņam ir ātri jāizdomā jauns ēdiens. Mazais Šefpavāriņš gatavo gvakamoli un viņam jāiemācās dalīties brīžos, kad viņa draugi grib palīdzēt un izmantot jaunu virtuves piederumu.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Pūciņas kundze kopā ar Tēraudu apmeklē noslēpumainu salu, lai aplūkotu dāvanu no brālēna Aleksa. Mafins plāno panākt, ka Dinobots iekuļas nepatikšanās, bet viņa plāns neizdodas, jo abi kopā ar Lolu iestrēgst nekontrolējamā kosmosa kuģī.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāki ielūguši Pepas ģimeni uz pusdienām. Ceļā Pepa, Džordžs, mamma un tētis nonāk sastrēgumā, tāpēc vectēvs nolemj aizvest viņiem pusdienas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāki aizved Pepu un Džordžu uz pludmali, kur ir daudz akmeņu un akmens baseinu. Viņi visi izpriecājas ar krabi, gliemežvāku un fosilijām. Pepa spainī izglābj zivtiņu un ielaiž to atpakaļ jūrā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni bauda pikniku. Pastnieks Zebra un Zoja arī devušies piknikā, tāpēc viņi nolemj sanākt visi kopā. Kad laiks doties mājās, Pepa aizmirst savu lācīti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Spēļu grupiņā ir jauns bērns - Zilonis Emīlija. Visi grib ar viņu draudzēties, jo viņai padodas būvēt ar klucīšiem un radīt skaņas ar auto.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras palīdzību lūdz košā alebrihe Ale. Alebrihu koks ir novītis, tāpēc Dorai jādodas meklēt varavīksnes ūdens. Karstā dienā visi ilgojas pēc saldējuma, bet Valas furgons ir iestidzis smiltīs! Dora iet palīgā, lai visi tiktu pie aukstā našķa.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders.
